body.name: ETELI 4 Tier Bookshelf S-Shaped Small Bookcase Modern Freestanding Multifunctional Wooden Book Shelves for Farmhouse, Living Room, Bedroom, and Home Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 54 mins
features: 【S-Shaped Elegance Reimagined】Let your space shine with the distinctive S-shaped design of the ETELI small book shelf. More than just storage, comic book storage is an artistic addition that effortlessly blends into any room's ambiance. Be it a contemporary vibe or modern minimalism, this bookshelf organizer adds a touch of sophistication.

【Tailored for Compact Living】The ETELI book shelf organizer measuring 15.7" x 11.8" x 41.5", is a perfect fit for apartments, studios, and offices. The bookshelves and bookcases optimizes vertical space without overwhelming your room, creating an organized haven you've always desired.

【Crafted for Endurance】Experience quality at its finest. The solid metal frame and premium wood shelves of ETELI office bookshelf combine durability and style. Each shelf stands strong with a weight capacity of up to 40 pounds, allowing you to display your prized possessions with confidence.

【Family-Friendly Safety】Designed with your family in mind, the included anti-tip kit ensures safety for homes with children. Adjustable feet guarantee stability on various floor surfaces, fitting effortlessly into living rooms, bedrooms, and home offices.

【Assembly Made Easy, Support Guaranteed】No more assembly headaches. With ready-to-use components, precise holes, and a user-friendly installation manual, setting up your ETELI bookshelf is a breeze. Should you encounter any hiccups, our responsive support team stands ready to ensure your satisfaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Meet the ETELI S-Shaped Display Bookshelf: where form meets function. A chic, geometric design with versatile storage for modern homes

Waterproof MDF and Metal Compact Floor-Mounted Bookshelf Material: Solid metal Frame +MDF wood boardDimensions: 11.8"D x 15.7"W x 41.5"HWeight Capacity: Up to 40 pounds per shelfIdeal for: Office, bedroom, and living room spaces.
Versatile in Various Settings: Whether in living rooms, bedrooms, or offices, this bookshelf effortlessly elevates a variety of interior aesthetics.

Outstanding Storage Solution Showcasing a generously sized 12.7'' high tier and robust 0.39'' thick shelves, this bookshelf provides an outstanding storage solution. Adjustable Feet Effortlessly adjust the legs to ensure steadiness on uneven surfaces, delivering an extra layer of convenience.

The legs add over 4” to the height. Can they be left off or are they necessary? The shelf's legs provide both stability and floor protection. Yet, you have the flexibility to craft a unique style by assembling it without legs, tailored to your personal taste and space requirements. Your choice, your perfect shelf. Will the 4 tier bookshelf be strong enough to be completely filled without drooping? Indeed, the ETELI 4-tier bookshelf offers strength and stability, with each shelf supporting up to 40 lbs, ensuring it remains steadfast when displaying your cherished items. Are there assembly instructions provided, and what tools are needed? Absolutely! Our book shelf for the entryway comes with comprehensive assembly instructions. You'll find that assembling them is a breeze – all you need is a standard screwdriver to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is a really nice, modern looking book shelf. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, just what I needed for my small apt entrance. Great table, perfect height and good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy build
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in my little corner. Using as a book shelf & I love

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the quality, very sturdy as others have mentioned and looks great, but to be clear, it is NOT easy to put together. 😭 There is no video on YouTube or anywhere to walk you through the assembly. The instructions are HORRIBLE. I don't have a picture because I still haven't been able to put it together. Will probably pay someone which defeats the purpose of the reasonable cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Images and Easy to Build
reviews.reviewText: It looks just like what I was hoping for out of the images and was pretty easy/straightforward to put together! It also includes all the tools to build it if you don’t have a screwdriver, but it was much easier using my own tools than the ones that came with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dimensions are NOT accurate
reviews.reviewText: The dimensions shown in the 'size' image are NOT ACCURATE!Shelf height is about 11.7 inches, not 12.7 inches.That becomes a problem when you've bought the shelves to store record albums. 12.7 would fit an album (standing up) 11.7 does not.Fortunately, I have other media that will fit, so no need to return the shelves.Disappointed with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and looks great.
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and looks great. Better than anticipated for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice shelf
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy it was to put together and the color is a true black wood grain look. Make sure you pay attention to measurements, this shelf was perfect for my office.
